description: The scraper uses playwright to click on each profile card on real estate sites and scrap all information like a human would. It cuts out the tedious work for a person and can scrape lots of data very quickly.
reflections: I am proud that I was able to create a functioning web scraper that replaces humans for tedious tasks. This was important to me as I once had to complete this without the help of AI. At the time, I knew AI would have made it much easier, but I didn't know how to implement this. Now I do!
